bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from John R. Taylor to Jefferson Randolph Kean, July 3, 1928

div1.p: Taylor sends Kean a booklet on Reed.

div1.head: Letter from John R. Taylor to Jefferson Randolph Kean, July 3, 1928
div1.opener:
To be ans-
5018 Westminster Ave
Philadelphia. Pa
July 3rd 1928.
Col. Jefferson R. Kean.
Army Medical Museum
Washington. D. C.
Dear Dr Kean.
div1.p:
Enclosed find a
booklet referring to Dr Reed in
connection with yellow fever.

If you already have a copy, pass
this on to some other person, as it
is a valuable booklet. I have a duplicate.
No acknowledgement of receipt is
required, as will take for granted
it has been received.
